document_data.name: Whistle
document_data.value5e: 5 [[cp]] (signal whistle){{Cite adventurers league/Blood Above, Blood Below|16}}

Description.Construction: Whistles could be made out of many common materials, for example [[wood]] or [[bone]].{{Cite adventurers league/Poisoned Words|8}} They were used by [[human]]s and other races, such as [[hobgoblin]]s and [[bugbear]]s.

Notable usages.Spell components:
Whistles were necessary to cast various magical [[spell]]s.
* The ''[[Mordenkainen's faithful hound]]'' and ''[[call hounds]]'' spells required the caster to use a [[silver]] whistle.
* ''[[Bird charm I]]'' required the caster to carve a whistle out of [[coral]] to be used as the spell's [[material component]].
* Similarly, ''[[bird charm II]]'' required a whistle made of fine [[jade]].
* The [[maztican]] spell ''[[huntsman's call]]'' required the caster to use a whistle crafted from the claw of a [[jaguar]].

document_data.Notable vendors: * Whistles designed to attract or repel animals could be purchased from [[Aurora's Emporium]] for 1 [[gp]].
document_data.Notable whistles:
* The ''[[whistle of shrieking]]'' was a magical ivory whistle used by [[Tasloi]] priests to increase the morale of their allies.
* The ''[[whistle of warning]]'' allowed nearby allies to react with unusual swiftness, make a close leap or draw a sword.{{Cite LFR/DRAG2-3/Of Wild and Darkened Waters|30}}

Rumors & Legends.Divine gifts: It was said that on occasions, the [[Lords of the Golden Hills]] who took a liking to a mortal while traveling the [[multiverse]] would offer them a magical golden whistle that could mimic the singing of any bird.
Rumors & Legends.Magical whistles: According to rumors told in the [[Yawning Portal]], magical whistles existed that could grant their users supernatural flying abilities, or the power to animate dead creatures.
